segments.text: Hello , Mr Brown . I'm glad you came in today ; we've just opened a new service that you might be interested in . It's called Bank Securities Link .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's actually a Deposit Account that links to your Margin Account , the one you have with the Securities Company . You can transfer the money you have in your account into your Fund Account .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can use your Deposit Book or your Credit Card . And of course , you can use our e-banking .
segments.speaker: S1
